nodes.text: Kammris was a metallic ore that was found in polymetallic nodules in the seas of the Western Reaches planet of Wadi Raffa. The active hydrothermal vents Wadi Raffa's seas created deposits of kammris and other ores, including doonium, dolovite, and meleenium. The mining company Turlin/Benthic Extraction used hydraulic pumps to bring the ores to the surface for processing.

Kammris was first mentioned in the 2016 canon novel Catalyst: A Rogue One Novel, written by James Luceno. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, kammris was first mentioned in the 1993 novel The Last Command, written by Timothy Zahn. The metal first appeared in the 2003 MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies, developed by Sony Online Entertainment.
